title: The waiting game
body: We turned our application in yesterday, so we should be hearing back from them (the SFDC) within the next 1 to 2 weeks. Keep your fingers crossed. Nicole and I are on vacation this week, thus the small post. Toodles.
author: Dan

comments.author: Fyse
comments.body: Enjoy the time off. Sounds like you've earned it. Best of luck with the application; I have crossed as many appendages as is humanly possible on your behalf.

comments.author: bjork24
comments.body: Thank you both, Oz and Fyse.

comments.author: einahpets
comments.body: I would sing the song about vacation, but I don't know the words except for "Vacation is all I ever wanted..."

comments.author: Tim
comments.body:
"...vacation, had to get away/ Vacation, meant to be spent alone."  

Fingers are crossed.

comments.author: nicole
comments.body: Don't forget to mention we put in an application with Technicolor to get an account.
